doctitle: Sources on the history of Zurich
title-text-1: The platform Sources on the History of Zurich (QZH) is the publication channel for transcriptions and digitised copies of selected source material from the State Archives Zurich. It is open to transcriptions from other institutions and collaboration partners. The edition follows the principles of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI), and all published items are also listed and accessible in the
title-text-2: In this way, the platform forms a digitally networked environment for consulting materials on Zurich history.
title-text-3: New sources are added to the platform at regular intervals.
title-text-link-2: online archive catalogue of the State Archives.
